questions.text: Which of the following books did Nathaniel Hawthorne write?
questions.explanation:
Scarlet Letter, The.

	"Silas Marner" was written by George Elliot. "Sun Also Rises" was written by Ernest Hemingway. "Skins" was written by Adrian Louis.

questions.text: Complete the lyrics to this "South Park" song. "I'm ___________ , thanks for asking, all things considered I couldn't be better I must say."
questions.explanation:
super.

	This song was song by Big Gay Al in "South Park".

salt.

	Sodium was first discovered in 1807 by Davy. He discovered it using electrolysis. Scheele discovered chlorine in 1774. He thought it contained oxygen. It wasn't named until Davy named it in 1810 and said it was an element.

questions.text: Which of these "S" words would get you the most points in a game of Scrabble? (This is only by letter value, not where it's placed on the board.)
questions.explanation:
summer.

	Summer would give you ten points. Snow would give you seven points. Spring would give you nine, and salad is worth six points.

questions.text: What movie has characters such as Prince Valium and Yogurt?
questions.explanation:
Spaceballs.

	"Spaceballs" came out in 1987 and was directed by Mel Brooks, who also played Yogurt as well as President Skroob.

questions.text: Which of these words means "a banquet"?
questions.explanation:
smorgasbord.

	Supercilious means overly proud. Superfluous means more than enough. Scheol is the world of the dead in some religions according to dictionary.com.

questions.text: Who is the mascot for Alka-Seltzer?
questions.explanation:
Speedy.

	"Plop, plop fizz, fizz oh what a relief it is."

Senegal.

	The capital of Singapore is Singapore. The capital of Sudan is Khartoum. The capital of Swaziland is Mbabane. You can get a list of world capitals at http://www.infoplease.com/ipa/A0855603.html.

questions.text: Which animal is also a name for one of the seven deadly sins?
questions.explanation:
sloth.

	Another word for sloth is laziness. The animal associated with sloth is not the sloth, however, it is the goat.

questions.text: What is the Italian word for seven?
questions.explanation:
sette.

	"Sei" is Italian for six. "Serpente" is snake, and "sesso" means sex.
